.column.bg-main1[.right.vmiddle.content[
## .yellow[Questions]

Community health centre workers present with .yellow[burnout traits]?

.yellow[Mean differences] between the hospital and community health centre?

Does burnout .yellow[impede effective] work pace?

Interference in conducting .yellow[household activities] and burnout?

Compared to .yellow[before the pandemic], is working in a healthcare institution a stressor?
]]

.column.bg-main4[.vmiddle.content[
## .yellow[Hypotheses]

.yellow[Heightened distress] may cause burnout among community health centre
workers.

A proportion of healthcare sectors may report a .yellow[greater degree] of
burnout.

Healthcare worker with burnout traits will have .yellow[lower work efficiency].

Interference in conducting household activities .yellow[associates] with
experiencing a burnout.

Working in a healthcare institution during the pandemic is a .yellow[stressor].
]]
